section.p: Educational Resources for students during our School Closure:

br.span: – a central login point for many of the student softwares used at school

li.span: – Get access to Classroom, Docs, etc.

ul.li: Kurzweil – All Ages; Unique login for each student

li.span: These links will give you access to the exercises but will not save your progress:

p.span: free printable packets for grade school level students

ul.li: Albany Can Code Live Coding Classes
Albany Can Code Videos of Previous Classes

li.strong: Cool Places to “Visit” (including Virtual Tours & Live Webcams)

a.span: National Gallery of Art, Washington, D.C.
Smithsonian National Museum of Natural History, Washington, D.C.
NASA Langley Research Center in Virginia
National Women’s History Museum in Alexandria, Virginia
National Museum of the United States Air Force
National Museum of Modern and Contemporary Art, Seoul
The J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles
National Museum of Anthropology, Mexico City
Reid Park Zoo Lion Cam in Tuscon, AZ
Ouwehand Park Polar Bear Cubs Rhenen, Netherland
Tour of the Great Wall of China
